entry.title: Turtle Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Small
Price: 5.40 - 12.90 (7 variants)

This box turtle is a replica of one that we found years ago swimming in a lake. We fed it for a day or two then put it back where we found it. Turtles carry a positive vibe and so does this wonderful charm, pass on the goodness, to a friend.
